detail_desc: Calf-length, double-breasted coat woven in a wool blend with a lightly brushed finish. Large hood and lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, diagonal welt front pockets and a high-cut single back vent. Recycled polyester lining. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Calf-length, double-breasted coat woven in a wool blend with a lightly brushed finish. Large hood and lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, diagonal welt front pockets and a high-cut single back vent. Recycled polyester lining. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses. Plastic sidepieces with a stylish inset section in gold-coloured metal.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses. Plastic sidepieces with a stylish inset section in gold-coloured metal.
Rectangular sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and flap leg pockets.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and flap leg pockets.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and flap leg pockets.
Geometric-shaped sunglasses with frames and sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Round sunglasses with a decorative metal chain at the top and thin side pieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Classic V-neck jumper in fine-knit merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Classic V-neck jumper in fine-knit merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short lace dress with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Short lace dress with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Short, flared skirt in woven fabric with a regular waist and concealed zip at the back. Discreet side pockets and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Short, flared skirt in woven fabric with a regular waist and concealed zip at the back. Discreet side pockets and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in crinkled jersey with a gentle V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist, and wide, straight legs.
Full-length, straight-cut trousers in lace. Regular waist with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and legs with creases. Lined at the top.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short, V-neck dress in cotton jersey with covered buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in cotton jersey with covered buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Kids Exclusive. Leggings in soft, lightweight wool jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Kids Exclusive. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.
Hat in soft, rib-knit, warming wool with a turn-up at the hem.
Kids Exclusive. Mittens in soft, rib-knit wool. Lined in soft cotton jersey.
Kids Exclusive. Jumper in soft, rib-knit wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Kids Exclusive. Jumper in soft, rib-knit wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lightweight windbreaker in woven fabric with a print motif. Detachable, mesh-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in fleece.

Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a lined hood in a contrasting colour. Buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a lined hood in a contrasting colour. Buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved playsuit in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with gentle draping at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam and a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, and diagonal side pockets.

Shorts in viscose twill with decorative zips, an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.

Shorts in viscose twill with decorative zips, an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed trim around the neckline, a flounce in a broderie anglaise weave over the shoulders, and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Round sunglasses with metal frames, chain-shaped sidepieces in metal and plastic and adjustable nose pads. Tinted, UV-protective, plastic, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Rectangular sunglasses with pearly plastic frames and slim sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Bracelet in fabric and metal with shells. Adjustable length.
Cardigan in a soft, textured knit. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, textured knit. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Metal hair clip decorated with a bow made of plastic beads. Length of hair clip 6.5 cm.

Strapless bandeau bras in cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and side support.

Set with a shirt, pair of shorts and a bow tie in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets, a fake back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, flap leg pockets and narrow hems.

High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Joggers in cotton denim with jersey-covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake diagonal front pockets and ribbed jersey hems.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a scalloped trim around the neckline.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of dungarees. Dungarees in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a concealed press-stud at one side and straps with adjustable buttoning. Chest pocket and patch leg pockets, one with a small fabric appliqué. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y) and covered elastication at the hems. Top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with a round neckline and gathered seam at the top. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Loafers in soft suede with a decorative tab and moccasin seam at the front. Leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and dropped shoulders with a press-stud at one side. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
